    social.lecker.coffee

    about

    preview

    Mastodon

    Users: 2 . Toots: 1 . Connections: 328 . Language: Deutsch

    social.lecker.coffee

    More Info... Blocked instances

    We use the same blocking rules as Toot.cafe, which you can see here: Blocked instances

    Instance rules

    Rules are taken from Mastodon.social and Toot.cafe

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lecker.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Pornography and sexually explicit content

    Gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: HeadBarista@lecker.coffee

    Admin: @HeadBarista@social.lecker.coffee

    theferret.social

    about

    preview

    join

    The Ferret Social

    Users: 3 . Toots: 18 . Connections: 189 . Language: English

    This Mastodon instance is hosted by a media co-operative based in Scotland, called The Ferret.

    This means that all the people posting on it, can also own and help fund it.

    If you want an account here, then you should be a paying member of The Ferret.

    This is something of an experiment - but we want it to be sustainable. Should costs of supporting it become too great, we may remove any accounts that have been set up with an email address that is not linked to a paying member of The Ferret.

    More Info... Who runs this place?

    @ally is the main admin.

    Members of this instance should uphold the Code of Coduct put together by Tootcat

    If you are being harassed or have reason to be concerned by anything posted to this instance then you should contact the administrator by email with as much detail as you can.

    The administrators of this instance report to the Directors of The Ferret. The Directors are elected from the members every year. Their decision about what happens on the site is final. So far we've had no reason to block any other instances of Mastodon, but we will do this if we feel it's needed.

    Email: contact@theferret.scot

    Admin: Not Available

    scotland.computer

    about

    preview

    join

    Scottish Tech Mastodon

    Users: 30 . Toots: 113 . Connections: 156 . Language: English

    An instance of the Mastodon social network for the tech/startup scene in Scotland.

    The goal is to gather all the web/tech people in one place to make for an interesting local timeline.

    You don't need to actually be Scottish or in Scotland! Friends, the curious, and all of good will are welcome!

    More Info... This is an open instance of the Mastodon social network, aimed at gathering the Scottish web/tech/startup scene in one local timeline.

    You don't need to be Scottish or in Scotland to be welcome here! If you're interested in the tech scene, or friends with people here, you're more than welcome!

    Code of Conduct

    This will be fleshed out in more detail at a later date, but the summary is:

    Show respect for people's personal space. If they don't want you in their mentions, leave.

    Do not use this platform to harass, stalk, troll, spam, or otherwise be a dick.

    No nazis.

    If you are experiencing harassment or spamming, please report the offending account and I'll investigate. If you feel at risk or otherwise want to contact the admin directly, I can be reached at john@scotland.computer.

    The mgmt reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason, except as prohibited by law.

    Email: john@scotland.computer

    Admin: @semanticist@scotland.computer

    toot.berlin

    about

    preview

    join

    toot.BERLIN

    Users: 495 . Toots: 4353 . Connections: 988 . Language: English

    The Mastodon instance for Berlin. Mastodon is a free, decentralised microblogging platform (think Twitter, but free).
    Provided by the devops nerds at Planio .
    Impressum · Datenschutzerklärung

    More Info... This instance is humming nicely on a 6 core, 16 GB RAM KVM VM on a 12 core, 128 GB RAM bare metal hardware node with dual SSDs in a RAID1, hosted at Hetzner in Germany with multiple redundant uplinks on 100% renewable energy sources. We perform offsite backups daily and upgrade to the latest Mastodon version frequently.TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.Code of conduct: We value free speech as long as it's not harming anybody. Just don't be a jerk.

    Email: jan@toot.berlin

    Admin: @jan@toot.berlin

    mastonon.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastonon

    Users: 1 . Toots: 392 . Connections: 331 . Language: English

    現在このインスタンスは実験目的の運用となっており、少数の方を限定的に招待しております。物好きな方はどうぞ。

    また、このインスタンスはメンテナンスや更新作業、またはトラブルなどにより予告なく停止する場合もございます。

    Currently, this instance is operated experimental and accepted to join a few users.

    Also, this instance will possibility of stop for maintenance, update and what something.

    More Info... このインスタンスは個人によって運営されています。広告の掲載や利用料の請求などは一切ありません。

    安定と快適な運用のため、よろしければ寄付をお願いします。

    3HChQHgdM6PfrF6Gp2VoKZmYadUtziEzkJ

    インスタンス内での投稿内容の転載または利用をお考えの方へ

    当インスタンス内でのユーザーの投稿内容の権利はすべて投稿したユーザーに帰属します。無断で利用する事はできません。また、営利目的での利用を検討している場合、当人から返答をもらえなかった場合も含め、基本的には利用、転載はお断りしております。もしどうしても利用したい場合は直接本人に問い合わせ、然るべき対価、報奨金をお支払いください。※ここで言う「営利目的」とは、利用者またはスポンサーなどから何らかの収益または対価を得る事を目的として運用されている場合を指します。

    お問い合わせについて

    このインスタンスについてのお問い合わせは右記連絡先まで、日本語または英語にてお気軽にお問い合わせください。

    This instance is operated by individual person.

    I don't show advertisement and you don't need to pay money.

    However if you can help me, please donate for stable and comfortable operation.

    3HChQHgdM6PfrF6Gp2VoKZmYadUtziEzkJ

    About using our contents on your sites, and etc

    All rights of users' contents within this instance belong to the user who posted. You can not be used without permission by each users. Also, when you are considering using for commercial purposes, we will refuse to use and reprint, basically including cases where we did not get a reply from us. If you want to use it absolutely, please contact the person directly and pay the appropriate remuneration and incentive.

    * The terms "commercial purpose" as pointed herein refers to the case where it is operated for the purpose of obtaining some profit or consideration from users or sponsors.

    Contact us If you need ask something about this instance, please feel free to let owner know. You can contact us in English or Japanese.

    Email: info@mastonon.net

    Admin: @anon@mastonon.net

    hamtter.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Hamtter[For Radio Amateur]

    Users: 54 . Toots: 1165 . Connections: 174 . Language: English

    hamtter.netへようこそ。
    アマチュア無線家 のためのMastodonインスタンスです。
    ※フリーライセンスラジオやBCL/SWLは扱いません。
    登録時の ユーザー名 は必ずご自身に割り当てられている アマチュア無線のコールサインを半角英数大文字 で指定してください。
    例) JA1QRZ 7K4QTH 等
    アマチュア無線を楽しんでいることの確認のため、 登録用メールアドレスは文末のいずれかのドメイン名のみ 受け付けます。
    本登録に必要な電子メールが送信されますので、事前に正しく転送されるか確認後に登録作業を行って下さい。
    @jarl.com @arrl.net
    Internet Explorerは使えません。
    他のブラウザを使って下さい。
    For Amateur Radio Operator .
    Notice:NO CB Radio or BCL/SWL.
    Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case) .
    example) W0QRZ KA1QTH etc.
    Valid mail address,below domains ONLY.
    @jarl.com @arrl.net
    Mastdon NOT SUPPORT Internet Explorer.

    Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case).

    ユーザー名にアマチュア無線のコールサインを設定し忘れた方は、ユーザー設定にて表示名に半角英数大文字で入れて下さい。

    NO WARRANTY AS-IS.

    このインスタンスは極力安定稼働へ努力をいたしますが、個人で運営しているため、動作は無保証、あるがままです。

    他インスタンスからリモートフォローをしてきたユーザは必ずしもアマチュア無線家とは限りません。

    迷惑だと感じた場合はブロックを推奨します。 参加することによる金銭的な損失、個人情報などの毀損については一切関知しません。

    Email: je4smq@jarl.com

    Admin: @JE4SMQ@hamtter.net

    psodon.com

    about

    preview

    join

    PSODON - PSO2 Mastodon instance

    dqfan.club - Mastodon

    Users: 241 . Toots: 1021 . Connections: 89 . Language: English

    ゲーム好き、ドラクエ好き、ドラクエ10プレイヤー、ドラクエ11が楽しみ！な人の為のマストドンインスタンスです。ただいま新規登録大募集中です。 100人ほどで一旦登録を停止しますのでお早めに！
    まだまだ余裕なので募集中です！
    Twitterでシェアしてお友達を誘ってわいわいできるといいですねー

    ツイート

    スマホアプリ


    ルール

    ゲーム好きな方が集まるインスタンスです。

    雑談やドラクエ以外のゲームの話題もＯＫです。

    法律に違反するような書き込みなどは禁止です。

    ＲＭＴなどが疑われる書き込みは禁止です。

    違反行為を見かけたら通報機能で報告お願いします。

    mstdn.jpとpawoo.netとは繋がらないようになっています。

    不適切な書き込みは削除やBANを行う事があります。

    みんな仲良くね！

    メンテナンス情報

    2017/04/18

    ・バージョン1.2へアップデートしました。

    ・データベース消失しました。

    ・mstdn.jpをpawoo.netをドメインブロックしました。

    Admin: @admin@mastodon.dqfan.club

    mdn.hinaloe.net

    about

    preview

    join

    ひな丼

    Users: 20 . Toots: 2853 . Connections: 527 . Language: 日本語

    Hinaloe ( @hnle0 ) の実験的インスタンス。
    日本国法内で おねがいします。詳しくは、 このインスタンスについて をご覧ください。

    Hinaloe (@hnle0) の実験的インスタンスです。

    実験的インスタンスなのでいつまで利用できるかはわかりませんが、日本の法に触れない使い方なら自由に使っていただけるはずです。もちろん常識の範囲内で。

    main language: Japanese

    構成

    このインスタンスは大多数に使われることを想定していないため、現状のリソースはほぼほぼ最低限になっています。ユーザー数が多くないためこれによってもっさりしたり遅延が発生することは無いはずです。

    AWS EC2 (ap-norteast-1 Tokyo)

    instance

    t2.micro

    vCPU数

    1

    Memory

    1GB

    EBS

    20GB 画像サーバー：S3+Cloudfront

    4com.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    4com.jp

    Users: 504 . Toots: 2053 . Connections: 74 . Language: English

    Mastodonのインスタンスを試しに立ててみたかったので立ててみました。 なんかモノ作る人たちで集まれればなとゆるく考えてます。ROM専歓迎

    Mastodonのインスタンスを試しに立ててみたかったので立ててみました。

    Mastodonって流行ってっけどなんぞや？ という方々、試しに使ってみてください。

    4comとか名前つけてますが４コママンガとかフツーのとか、アニメとか小説とか

    なんかモノ作る人たちで集まれればなとゆるく考えてます。ROM専歓迎！

    ==================================================

    ルール

    日本国の法律に抵触するような公序良俗に反する投稿はyametene。

    とりあえず全年齢対象の方向でお願いします。エログロ自重の方向で。

    テスト的な面が強いので接続数によってはものっすごく重くなったり、最悪突然消えてなくなります。ご了承下さい。一応死ぬ前には断末魔の声上げます。

    To担当様、すいませんネームそろそろ上がります

    お問い合わせは， sysinfo.4com@gmail.com まで。 ・鯖代ホゲーってなるような事あったらとりま公式で叫びます。

    Email: sysinfo.4com@gmail.com

    Admin: @sironeko@4com.jp

    gbtdn.tokyo

    about

    preview

    join

    GBTDN

    Users: 695 . Toots: 24802 . Connections: 109 . Language: English

    ゲイ・バイの男性をターゲットとしたMastodon(マストドン)です。仲間が集まるマストドンで自分を隠さずトゥート(つぶやき)しませんか？ゲイ・バイの男性でしたら、どなたでもご参加いただけます。
    →はじめてのGBTDN
    マストドンって？
    Twitterと同様に、500文字までの短文をつぶやくことができるSNSです。「Mastodon（マストドン）」という仕組みを使って、様々なジャンルのサーバーが立ち上がっています。ニュースなどで取り上げられ、全世界で60万人以上のユーザーが登録しています。ここはそのゲイ・バイの男性版です。
    ご参加にあたって
    ■同性愛に関する内容が含まれます。ゲイ・バイの男性以外やご理解のない方はご遠慮ください。
    ■トゥート(つぶやき)は、日常のことからちょっとHなことまで、内容に縛りはありません。「ローカルタイムライン」には登録者全員のトゥートが表示されるので、そこから繋がることもできます。（トゥート毎の公開設定によりフォロワー限定で公開することもできます。Twitterと比べて細かい設定が可能です。）
    ※日本の法律に抵触する内容は禁止です。
    ※サーバー設置場所：国内（アップされる画像・動画は海外）
    各種メールが届かない場合
    迷惑メール設定を行っている場合、メールが「迷惑メールフォルダ」等へ振り分けられていないか、ご確認ください。GBTDNのドメイン【gbtdn.tokyo】からメールを受信できるよう、設定の確認をお願いいたします。
    2017/4/15 スタート！

    More Info... 他インスタンスからのリモートフォローについて

    当インスタンスの性質上、他インスタンスユーザーからのリモートフォローはお控えください。また、リモートフォローをされる場合には、GBTDNユーザーの意思を必ずご確認ください（プロフィール欄にリモートフォローについて記載しているケースが多いです）。なお、GBTDNユーザーの意思に反し執拗にリモートフォローをする行為が見受けられた場合、当該インスタンス自体をブロック対象とする可能性があります。（GBTDNユーザーによる他インスタンスへのリモートフォローを制限するものではありません。）

    他インスタンスのブロック状況につきましては、管理者のタイムラインをご確認ください。

    *About remote follow from other instances

    Please refrain from remote follow on the nature of this instance. Also, in case of remote follow, be sure to check the intention of the follower user (There are many cases describing remote follow in the profile field.) In addition, if you act persistently remote follow against user's intention, there is a possibility that the instance itself is blocked.

    GBTDNインフォメーション(以下別ウインドウで開きます)

    ■登録情報の取り扱いについて

    ■ビジネスアカウントについて

    BackgroundImage：©alant79

    Email: kanri@ml.gbtdn.tokyo

    Admin: @gbtdn@gbtdn.tokyo

    mastodon.huma-num.fr

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Huma-Num

    Users: 340 . Toots: 4362 . Connections: 664 . Language: English

    L'instance mastodon d'Huma-Num est dédiée à l'enseignement supérieur et à la recherche. Elle se veut interdisciplinaire et ouverte à tous. Elle est mise en oeuvre et maintenue par la très grande infrastructure de recherche Huma-Num pour les sciences humaines et sociales numériques.

    More Info... A propos de cette instance

    Instance mastodon dédiée à l'enseignement supérieur et à la recherche. Elle se veut interdisciplinaire et ouverte à tous. Elle est mise en oeuvre et maintenue par la TGIR Huma-Num.

    Nous vous demandons de rester courtois et polis dans vos échanges. De plus, les contenus suivant sont strictement interdit : Raciste, sexiste, homophobe, apologie du terrorisme, incitation à la haine raciale ou au suicide, pornographie, etc. Nous nous réservons le droit de bloquer tout utilisateur ne respectant pas ces règles de base.

    Huma-Num est une très grande infrastructure de recherche (TGIR) visant à faciliter le tournant numérique de la recherche en sciences humaines et sociales. Pour remplir cette mission, elle est bâtie sur une organisation originale consistant à mettre en œuvre un dispositif humain (concertation collective) et technologique (services numériques) à l’échelle nationale et européenne en s’appuyant sur un important réseau de partenaires et d’opérateurs.

    La TGIR Huma-Num favorise ainsi, par l’intermédiaire de consortiums regroupant des acteurs des communautés scientifiques, la coordination de la production raisonnée et collective de corpus de sources (recommandations scientifiques, bonnes pratiques technologiques). Elle développe également un dispositif technologique unique permettant le traitement, la conservation, l'accès et l'interopérabilité des données de la recherche. Ce dispositif est composé de services dédiés, d'une plateforme d'accès unifié (ISIDORE) et d'une procédure d'archivage des données à long terme.

    La TGIR Huma-Num propose en outre des guides de bonnes pratiques technologiques généralistes à destination des chercheurs. Elle peut mener ponctuellement des actions d'expertise et de formation. Elle porte la participation de la France dans le projet DARIAH en coordonnant les contributions nationales.

    La TGIR Huma-Num est portée par l'Unité Mixte de Services 3598 associant le CNRS, l'Université d'Aix-Marseille et le Campus Condorcet.

    Contacts

    TGIR Huma-Num - UMS 3598

    Email: stephane.pouyllau@huma-num.fr

    Admin: @spouyllau@mastodon.huma-num.fr

    mastodon.land

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 1107 . Toots: 10182 . Connections: 901 . Language: English

    Free Mastodon instance open to all users.
    Create an account here give you an opportunity to interact with mastodon users across all other instances.

    More Info... Description

    We believe in free softwares and we plan to maintain our instance on the long term.

    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time.

    Any user not respecting these rules may get suspended.

    Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited

    Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description

    Servers location : France

    Stats

    Mastodon

    Système

    Email: contact@rock-hosting.com

    toot.cat

    about

    preview

    join

    Toot.Cat

    Users: 626 . Toots: 32422 . Connections: 1148 . Language: English

    A mastodon instance for cats and the people that love them. In that spirit we are a home for building a radically inclusive mastodon instance. By creating an account you agree to follow our CoC located on the "Extended Information" page .

    Support

    • @support

    Instance Admins

    • @polymerwitch
    • @cyrinsong
    • @wavebeem

    Moderators

    • @ashkitten Developer Cat

    More Info...

    Code of Conduct

    General

    As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct

    Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

    Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

    Not be used a profile picture

    Be posted with the image content warning (currently "NSFW") tag

    Not be posted to the public timeline

    the above rules apply to content that is:

    Violent

    Flashing or rapidly changing

    Nudity / Sex / Kink

    Nudity / Imagery of sex / Kink act will be abbreviated as NSK

    NSK Content Warnings

    Nudity is allowed without a CW as long as no genitals or nipples are shown

    If they are visible in the image they must be censored

    Nipple censoring pertains to any gender

    Any sexual imagery must be hidden as a sensitive image

    Sexual imagery is considered to be any sex / kink act regardless of clothing state / nudity

    Sexual imagery and nudity are distinct concepts

    No illegal imagery is allowed regardless of CW state

    NSK with a CW do not need to be censored in any way

    Violation of the content warning rules will

    An immediate silence when its violated on the federation timeline

    A domain silence when its violated by multiple parties on an instance

    A warning and admin editing your content when its violated by toot.cat users

    NSK Consent To Post

    NSK should not have other users tagged without their explicit prior consent

    Posting NSK that is not of yourself needs to include attribution to the person(s) visible, in such a way that clearly expresses their consent to have that imagery posted

    Violation of the consent to post rule will result in

    An immediate suspension when its violated on the federation timeline

    A domain suspension when its violated by multiple parties on an instance

    (1) warning, followed by account deletion when its violated by toot.cat users

    toot.cat supports and invites sex workers to join our community and will not tolerate any harassment or slurs made at or about sex workers (ie: prostitute, hooker, whore)

    Closing

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on toot.cat and to public spaces when an individual is representing toot.cat or its community.

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Email: TootCatHQ@gmail.com

    Admin: @polymerwitch@toot.cat

    mstdn.debate.info-labs.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodebate

    Users: 49 . Toots: 37 . Connections: 4 . Language: English

    日本語アカデミックディベートを中心としたディベートサーバーです。 https://debate.info-labs.jp/

    ディベート情報研究所では情報学とディベートを組み合わせた技術を公開しています。 次世代Webアーカイブ https://info-labs.jp/crawler/ はWebアーカイブが有効であることを示すデジタル署名により、たとえWebサービスが終了した後も正当な証拠として機能する新たなWebアーカイブサービスです。これにより、Webサービスが終了してしまえば証拠が消えてしまう不安定な証拠の確保である従来のWebアーカイブサービスとは異なり、ユーザーの手元でWebアーカイブを管理することができるようになります。

    Email: support+mastodon@debate.info-labs.jp

    Admin: @InfoLabs_jp@mstdn.debate.info-labs.jp

    paoon.club

    about

    preview

    join

    パオーンクラブ

    Users: 28 . Toots: 870 . Connections: 406 . Language: English

    ゆるーく繋がりたい。そんなあなたにオススメします。
    ローカルタイムラインはバスの時刻表よりもゆったりです。
    いつでもどこでも、パオーンしたくなったら、パオーンクラブに行ってみよう。
    このインスタンスは自宅サーバーで運用されています。予告なくサービスの停止が発生する場合がございます。ご了承ください。

    免責

    基本的に対応できる時間が朝の4時から5時の朝活の時間のみとなっておりますので、何かあってもそこまでは対応できないことが多いです。すみません。

    禁止事項

    ・公序良俗に反する行為

    ・サーバーに著しく負担をかける行為

    ・botやツールの使用は制限しませんが、他の利用者の迷惑になる行為や、サーバーのリソースを使い果たす行為、ただの実験行為などは他のインスタンスで行うか、自分でインスタンスを立てましょう。

    ゆったりとした時間が流れますように。

    Email: twitter : @szsuke

    Admin: @szsuke@paoon.club

    mammouth.cafe

    about

    preview

    join

    Mammouth Café

    Users: 116 . Toots: 5149 . Connections: 856 . Language: English

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.
    PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

          .----.-.     _____________________________________
     /    ( o \   /   Welcome! Bienvenue! Willkommen!   \
    '|  __ ` ||  /\  Benvenuta e benvenuto! Bainvegni!  /
     |||  ||| -'   -------------------------------------

    (In the spirit of tilde.club ...)

    English: Mammouth Café is a Swiss Mastodon instance running on a French server and open to the world. We particularly welcome artists and illustrators, journalists and writers, librarians and archivists, scientists and engineers, teachers, as well as all curious minds.
    Registrations will be limited to 640 users ( ‘640 users ought to be enough for anybody.’ — Bill Gates ).

    Français: Mammouth Café est une instance suisse de Mastodon tournant sur un serveur français et ouverte au monde. Nous accueillons particulièrement volontiers les artistes, les illustratrices et illustrateurs, les journalistes, les auteures et auteurs, les bibliothécaires et les archivistes, les scientifiques, les ingénieures et les ingénieurs, les enseignantes et enseignants, ainsi que tous les esprits curieux.
    Les inscriptions à cette instance seront limitées à 640 utilisateurs ( «640 utilisateurs devraient suffire à quiconque.» — Bill Gates ).

    Italiano: Mammouth Café è un'istanza svizzera di Mastodon installata su un server francese e aperta al mondo. Particolarmente benvenute e benvenuti sono artiste e artisti, illustratrici e illustratori, giornaliste e giornalisti, autori, bibliotecarie e bibliotecari, archivisti, scienziate e scienziati, ingegnere e ingegneri, insegnanti, così come tutte le menti curiose.
    Le iscrizioni su questa istanza saranno limitate a 640 utenti ( “640 utenti dovrebbero bastare a chiunque.” — Bill Gates ).

    With ❤ from Atelier Mammouth .

    More Info... [ English | Français | Italiano ]

    (Source)

    English

    Welcome to the Mammouth Café

    In the spirit of tilde.club, here are a few, simple rules:

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.

    There is NO GUILT here. NOR SHAME. Not knowing things is fine. Not finishing them is fine too.

    We're all trying, and we're all in this together. :)

    IMPORTANT NOTE: PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

    Guidelines

    Aside from the general rules stated above, mammouth.cafe follows principles similar to those of mastodon.social, to wit:

    Absolutely no content allowed that would be illegal in Switzerland and/or France.

    No discrimination, no racism, no xenophobia, no sexism, no incitement to hate or to violence of any kind.

    We take a very dim view of stalking or harassment of other persons, here or elsewhere.

    Same goes for encouraging or inciting other people to take part in such activities.

    There are CW (Content Warning) and NSFW (Not Safe For Work) options: use them accordingly when you post.

    No hard or child/minor pornography of any kind, and keep material of an erotic nature behind CW and/or NSFW filters.

    No gore or extremely graphic violence.

    No spam, no ads, no affiliate links or excessive promotion.

    Of course, you are still welcome to announce your latest comic, self-published novella or upcoming local amateur theatre stage play to our community.

    We discourage any sort of corporate accounts: we prefer to keep it personal.

    On the other hand, educational institutions, associations and other non-profit organisations (such as e.g. amateur dramatics groups) are warmly welcome.

    No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

    We discourage bots, unless they're cute or friendly.

    Robots that bang on the server will get bitcanned.

    Replicants are like any other machine: they’re either a benefit or a hazard. If they’re a benefit, it’s not our problem.

    No zombies allowed under any circumstance.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    Final interpretation and implementation of these rules, guidelines and of general good netiquette, as well as all decisions that may result in account suspension and/or revocation of access, will be up to the administration of mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Support is available: ping @support@mammouth.cafe.

    For status updates, planned downtimes and so on, you can follow @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Please remember: this is essentially a one-man show for now, so do not expect an answer within the hour. If it's urgent, try asking the community: someone may be able to lend you a hand.

    We'll try not to mess things up, but we probably will at some point. If you feel that what you post here is vital to you, do make a backup somewhere else (atom feeds are available for every account) or, even better, give some of your time and knowledge to help us out with this thing.

    Handling abuse and harassment

    If you are being abused or harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report."

    If you engage in abusing or harassing behavior, the administration may take any action we deem appropriate, such as an account suspension or revocation of access.

    Abuse is anything we say it is. Too bad if you disagree.

    Blocked instances

    We do block some Mastodon instances where a sizeable part of their community infringes our rules and/or guidelines with their behaviour. We do not usually comment on individual accounts muting, suspension or removal.

    Privacy and security

    We value your privacy. We are here to have fun, not to make any money by throwing ads down your throat or monetizing the shit out of your online activities. No ads or trackers are installed on this instance.

    Please understand however that mammouth.cafe's administrators have potentially access to your data, including your direct messages. The backend is also not encrypted. If this is not all right with you, this might not be the instance you're looking for.

    Finally, a word of advice: consider this a public space. Whatever you publish here is public and can (and probably will) be read by someone else or potentially be archived by the Internet Archive and/or other similar insititutions.

    We'll try to keep things reasonably safe, but if you need to keep your sources confidential or you are involved in activities that may put yourself or others in jeopardy in your country or elsewhere, please take into account the fact that we won't be able to offer you the necessary confidentiality and/or security here.

    Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. Use a dedicated E2E application with good reputation, like e.g. Signal, for the communications you really want to keep private.

    And remember to always practice safe hex.

    About this instance

    This instance is run by Atelier Mammouth in a TARDIS somewhere/time in a big ball of wibbly-wobbly timey-wimey... stuff.

    For the time being, costs for running this server are pretty reasonable and the admin can afford them. You should absolutely not feel obliged to pay anything, but if you really wish to support this thing, you can donate something on our Liberapay account. Thank you so much!

    But remember: we only accept donations. You don't pay us for this service. Don't act like you do.

    And remember: this is FREE software and...

    “...if it destroys your computer, rapes your pet, installs Win98 on your toaster and microwave, stops your pacemaker, causes sexual dysfunction, and turns your children into fucked-up trenchcoat-wearing teens carrying guns and worshipping Hitler, don't blame me because I told you it could do that and you went ahead and used it anyway.”

    — James Turinsky

    ⤴

    Français

    Bienvenue au Mammouth Café

    Dans l'esprit du tilde.club, voici quelques règles simples:

    Amusez-vous. Respectez les autres. Pas de drame.

    Il n'y a PAS DE FAUTE ici. NI DE HONTE. Ne pas savoir quelque-chose c'est bien. Ne pas finir quelque-chose c'est bien aussi.

    Nous faisons de notre mieux, et nous sommes à bord du même bateau. :)

    NOTE IMPORTANTE: SVP NE CASSEZ PAS LE GIBSON.

    Lignes directrices

    Outre les règles générales mentionnées ci-devant, mammouth.cafe suit des principes semblables à ceux de mastodon.social, à savoir:

    Nous ne permettons absolument aucun contenu qui serait illégal en Suisse et/ou France.

    Pas de discrimination, pas de racisme, pas de xénophobie, pas de sexisme, pas d'incitation à la haine ou à la violence d'aucune sorte.

    Nous ne tolérons pas le harcèlement ou l'intimidation d'autres personnes, ici ou ailleurs.

    Nous avons la même attitude envers quiconque encouragerait ou inciterait d'autres personnes à procéder de la sorte.

    Des options CW (Content Warning = avertissement de sujet sensible) et NSFW (Not Safe For Work = pas adapté à un environnement de travail ou public) vous sont proposées: employez-les à bon escient au moment de publier.

    Pas de pornographie dure ou impliquant des mineurs, d'aucune sorte. Veuillez également placer vos contenus de nature érotique derrière des filtres CW et/ou NSFW.

    Pas de contenu violent.

    Pas de spam, pas de pubs, pas de liens affiliés ou de promotion excessive.

    Bien entendu, vous pouvez sans autres annoncer votre dernière BD, votre roman auto-publié ou le prochain spectacle de votre troupe de théâtre amateur locale à notre communauté.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les comptes d'entreprise: on préfère garder une touche personnelle.

    D'autre part, nous accueillons volontiers les écoles, associations et autres organisations à but non lucratif (telles p.ex. les troupes de théâtre amateur).

    Pas de faux comptes personnifiant des célébrités, même dans un but humoristique.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les bots, à moins qu'ils ne soient mignons ou attachants.

    Les robots qui abusent du serveur seront envoyés à la casse.

    Les répliquants sont comme les autres machines: ils sont ou bénéfiques, ou nocifs. S’ils sont bénéfiques, c’est pas notre problème.

    Aucun zombie n'est admis, en aucun cas.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interprétation et l'application finales de ces règles, lignes directrices et de ce qui constitue une bonne nétiquette en général, ainsi que toute décision pouvant résulter en la suspension et/ou la suppression d'un compte, est du seul privilège de l'administration de mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Vous pouvez contacter notre support en suivant ou contactant ce compte: @support@mammouth.cafe.

    Afin d'obtenir des informations sur le statut du serveur, les arrêts planifiés pour des mises à jour, etc., vous pouvez également suivre @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Veuillez prendre bonne note que ceci est pour l'instant un spectacle interprété et mis en scène par une seule et même personne. Ne vous attendez donc pas à une réponse dans l'heure qui suit. S'il s'agit d'une urgence, essayez de poser votre question à l'ensemble de la communauté: il se peut que quelqu'un puisse venir à votre aide.

    Nous allons tâcher de ne pas gaffer, mais probablement que cela nous arrivera un jour ou l'autre. Si vous considérez ce que vous publiez ici comme absolument vital pour vous, faites-en une sauvegarde ailleurs (des flux atom sont disponibles pour chaque compte) ou, encore mieux, mettez à disposition un peu de votre temps et de vos connaissances pour nous aider avec tout ceci.

    Traitement des abus et du harcèlement

    Si vous êtes victime d'abus ou de harcèlement, veuillez signaler l'utilisateur à l'aide du bouton "…" puis "Signaler".

    Si vous avez un comportement abusif ou harcelant, l'administration peut prendre toute mesure que nous jugeons appropriée, telles une suspension de compte ou une révocation d'accès.

    Un abus est tout ce que nous considérons comme tel. Tant pis si vous n'êtes pas d'accord.

    Instances bloquées

    Nous bloquons certaines instances de Mastodon dans les cas où une partie importante de leur communauté enfreint nos règles et/ou lignes directrices avec son comportement. Nous ne faisons généralement aucun commentaire au sujet des comptes individuels ayant été rendus silencieux, suspendus ou supprimés.

    Confidentialité et sécurité

    Nous respectons votre vie privée. Nous sommes ici pour nous amuser, pas pour gagner de l'argent sur votre dos en vous faisant avaler des tonnes de pubs indigestes ou en monétisant à longueur de journée vos activités en ligne. Aucune publicité ou traceur n'est installé sur cette instance.

    Veuillez toutefois prendre bonne note que les administrateurs de mammouth.cafe ont potentiellement accès à toutes vos données, y compris vos messages directs. Le backend n'est pas chiffré non plus. Si cela ne vous convient pas, ceci n'est peut-être pas l'instance que vous recherchez.

    Enfin, un bon conseil: considérez ceci comme étant un espace public. Tout ce que vous publierez ici est public et peut être (et probablement sera) lu par d'autres personnes ou potentiellement être archivé par l'Internet Archive et/ou d'autres insititutions similaires.

    Nous allons tâcher de maintenir une sécurité raisonnable, mais si vous êtes dans l'obligation d'assurer la confidentialité de vos sources ou que vos activités risquent de mettre en péril vous-même ou d'autres personnes dans votre pays ou ailleurs, veuillez tenir compte du fait que nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir une confidentialité et/ou sécurité suffisante ici.

    En outre, pour des données vraiment privées envoyées entre deux personnes, Mastodon n'offre aucun chiffrement de bout en bout (end-to-end). Utilisez une application E2E dédiée avec une bonne réputation, comme Signal par exemple, pour les communications que vous souhaitez vraiment garder privées.

    Et n'oubliez pas de toujours vous protéger lors de toute activité hexuelle.

    À propos de cette instance

    Cette instance est gérée par l'Atelier Mammouth depuis un TARDIS quelque-part/temps dans une sorte de grande boule de truc-machin tempo-spatio... bidule.

    Pour le moment, les coûts liés à ce serveur sont plutôts raisonnables et l'administrateur peut se les permettre. Vous ne devez absolument pas vous sentir obligés à payer quoi que ce soit, mais si vous désirez vraiment soutenir cet effort, vous pouvez faire un don sur notre compte Liberapay. Merci beaucoup!

    Mais rappelez-vous: nous n'acceptons que les dons. Vous ne nous payez pas pour ce service. N'agissez pas comme si c'était le cas.

    Et rappelez-vous: ceci est un logiciel LIBRE et...

    “...s'il détruit votre ordinateur, viole votre chat, installe Win98 sur votre grille-pain et sur votre four à micro-ondes, bloque votre stimulateur cardiaque, vous rend impuissant et transforme vos enfants en de foutus ados portant des vestes en cuir, brandissant des armes et adorant Hitler, ne me blamez pas car je vous avait averti qu'il pourrait faire tout ça, et vous n'avez pas voulu m'écouter et vous l'avez quand-même utilisé.”

    — James Turinsky (traduit de l'anglais)

    ⤴

    Italiano

    Benvenuta e benvenuto al Mammouth Café

    Nello spirito del tilde.club, ecco alcune regole semplici:

    Divertiti. Rispetta le altre e gli altri. Niente drammi.

    Qui NON C'È COLPA. NÈ VERGOGNA. Non sapere qualche cosa va benissimo. Non finire qualche cosa va pure benissimo.

    Facciamo del nostro meglio, e siamo a bordo della stessa nave. :)

    NOTA IMPORTANTE: NON PIRATARE IL GIBSON, GRAZIE.

    Linee direttrici

    Oltre alle regole generali di qui sopra, mammouth.cafe segue principi simili a quelli di mastodon.social, vale a dire:

    Non permettiamo assolutamente nessun contenuto illegale in Svizzera e/o Francia.

    Nessuna discriminazione, nessun razzismo, nessuna xenofobia, nessun sessismo, nessun incitamento all'odio o alla violenza di alcun genere.

    Non toleriamo molestie o intimidazioni di altre persone, qui o altrove.

    Lo stesso vale per l'incorraggiamento o l'incitamento verso altre persone a prendere parte a tali attività.

    Ti proponiamo delle opzioni CW (Content Warning = avviso di contenuto sensibile) e NSFW (Not Safe For Work = non adatto ad un ambiente di lavoro o pubblico): utilizzale come si deve al momento di pubblicare.

    Nessuna pornografia dura o minorile di alcun tipo. Inoltre, pubblica il tuo materiale di natura erotica dietro filtri CW e/o NSFW.

    Nessun contenuto violento.

    Nessuno spam (pubblicità non richiesta), nessuna pubblicità, nessun rinvio (link) affiliato o promozione eccessiva.

    Naturalmente, se vuoi annunciare il tuo nuovo fumetto, il tuo ultimo romanzo autopubblicato o il prossimo spettacolo della compagnia teatrale amatoriale del tuo quartiere alla nostra communità, non c'è nessun problema.

    Scorraggiamo i conti aziendali: preferiamo mantenere un tocco personale.

    D'altra parte, accogliamo ben volentieri scuole, associazioni e altre organizzazioni non a scopo di lucro (come ad esempio una compagnia di teatro amatoriale).

    Nessun conto fasullo che impersno personaggi famosi, anche se solo a scopo umoristico.

    Scorraggiamo i bots, a meno che siano carini o amicali.

    I robot che abusano del server verranno rottamati.

    I replicanti sono come ogni altra macchina: possono essere un vantaggio o un rischio. Se sono un vantaggio, non sono un problema nostro.

    Non sono ammessi zombi, sotto nessuna circostanza.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interpretazione e l'applicazione finali di queste regole, linee direttrici e di ciò che costituisce una buona netichetta in generale, così come ogni decisione che può risultare in una sospensione del conto e/o una revocazione dell'accesso, sono in ultima istanza il privilegio dell'amministrazione di mammouth.cafe.

    Supporto

    Puoi seguire o contattare @support@mammouth.cafe per il supporto.

    Per informazioni sullo stato del server, sospensioni pianificate del servizio, ecc., puoi seguire @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Prendi buona nota del fatto che questo è per ora uno spettacolo diretto e interpretato da una sola persona. Non attenderti dunque ad una risposta nell'ora che segue. Se la tua domanda è urgente, prova a porrla alla communità: qualcun'altro potrebbe darti una mano.

    Cercheremo di non combinare guai, ma probabilmente lo faremo ad un momento o ad un altro. Se credi che ciò che pubblichi qui è di importanza vitale per te, fanne una salvaguardia da qualche altra parte (ci sono dei feed atom a disposizione per ogni conto) o, ancora meglio, offri un po' del tuo tempo e delle tue conoscenze per darci una mano con tutto questo.

    Trattamento di abusi e molestie

    Se sei vittima di abusi o molestie, segnala l'utente utilizzando il pulsante "…" e poi "Segnalare".

    Se hai un comportamento abusivo o offensivo, l'amministrazione può intraprendere qualsiasi azione che riterrà opportuna, come una sospensione del conto o una revoca dell'accesso.

    Abuso è ciò che noi consideriamo come tale. Se non sei d'accordo: peccato.

    Istanze bloccate

    Procediamo al blocco di alcune istanze Mastodon nei casi in cui una parte significativa delle loro communità violi le nostre regole e/o linee direttrici con il loro comportamento. In genere non commentiamo su conti individuali resi silenziosi, sospesi o soppressi.

    Privacy e sicurezza

    Rispettiamo la tua privacy. Siamo qui per divertirci, non per fare soldi sul tuo gobbo faccendoti inghiottire tonnelate di pubblicità indigeste o monetizzando tutto il giorno (e la notte) le tue attività online. Nessuna pubblicità o tracker sono presenti su questa istanza.

    Tuttavia, ricordati che gli amministratori di mammouth.cafe hanno potenzialmente accesso a tutti i tuoi dati, inclusi i tuoi messaggi diretti. Inoltre, il backend non è crittografato. Se questo non ti si addice, questa non è l'istanza che stai cercando.

    Infine, un buon consiglio: considera tutto questo come se fosse uno spazio pubblico. Tutto ciò che pubblicherai qui, sarà esposto al pubblico e potrà essere (e probabilmente sarà) letto da altre persone oppure potrà potenzialmente essere archiviato dall'Internet Archive e/o altre istutuzioni affini.

    Cercheremo di mantenere un livello di sicurezza ragionevole, ma se ti trovi in una situazione dove hai l'obbligo di mantenere la riservatezza delle tue fonti oppure nella quale le tue attività rischiano di mettere in pericolo te stesso o altre persone, nel tuo paese o altrove, ti preghiamo di notare che non siamo in grado di offrirti delle condizioni di privacy e/o di sicurezza sufficienti.

    Inoltre, per inviare dati in modo veramente privato tra due persone, Mastodon non offre alcuna crittografia da un capo all'altro (end-to-end). Utilizza un'applicazione dedicata E2E con buona reputazione, come Signal per esempio, per le comunicazioni che veramente desideri mantenere private.

    E ricordati di sempre proteggerti durante ogni rapporto hexuale.

    A proposito di questa istanza

    Questa istanza è gestita dall'Atelier Mammouth in un TARDIS da qualche parte/tempo in una specie di grande sfera di roba spazio-tempo... coso.

    Per il momento, i costi di questa istanza sono piuttosto ragionevoli e l'amministratore se li può permettere. Non devi assolutamente sentirti obbligato a pagare qualsiasi cosa, ma se veramente vuoi sostenere questo sforzo, puoi fare un dono sul nostro conto Liberapay. Grazie mille!

    Ma ricordati: accettiamo solo doni. Non ci paghi per questo servizio. Non agire come se fosse il caso.

    E ricordati: questo è un software LIBERO e...

    “...se distrugge il tuo computer, violenta il tuo gatto, installa Win98 sul tuo tostapane e sul tuo microonde, blocca il tuo stimolatore cardiaco, ti provoca disfunzioni sessuali e trasforma i tuoi bambini in fottuti adolescenti che indossano capotti e brandiscono armi adulando Hitler, non dare la colpa a me perchè ti avevo detto che poteva fare proprio questo, e tu non hai voluto ascoltarmi e lo hai utilizzato lo stesso.”

    — James Turinsky (tradotto dall'inglese)

    ⤴

    Credits

    SDF Acceptable Use Policy

    Floodgap Terms of Service

    GCC, the GNU Compiler Collection prompt

    Mastodon Guidelines (thank you @Gargron)

    Toot Café Code of Conduct (thank you @nolan)

    We trust you have received the usual lecture from the local System Administrator. It usually boils down to these three things:

    Respect the privacy of others.

    Think before you type.

    With great power comes great responsibility.

    Email: skk@mammouth.cafe

    Admin: @skk@mammouth.cafe

    coales.co

    about

    preview

    join

    COALES.CO - Come Together!

    Users: 4 . Toots: 172 . Connections: 280 . Language: English

    Micro-blogging site operated by Mark Shane Hayden of Coalesco Digital Systems Inc. We are located in Alberta, Canada. This is NOT intended to be a commercial/promotional site! Registration is open to anyone interested in civil discussions on any interesting topic--especially technology, current events and politics.

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    Site administration reserved the right to suspend or remove users that do not behave in a civil manner. Specific guidelines are being further developed and will be placed here as the site develops.

    Inappropriate Content

    Users who post inappropriate content will be suspended after a warning. Repeat offenders will be permanently banned.

    Advertisements of any kind without the express written permission of site administration are PROHIBITED. Please ask permission before posting anything of a commercial nature

    Bots are allowed only if they do not clutter the timeline or engage with other users without their permission. Please contact site administration before using bots to be sure they are appropriate!

    Content that is considered obscene, libelous, hate speech or otherwise unlawful under Canadian law will be removed immediately and the user who posted it banned without warning

    Personal attacks, derogatory remarks or discriminatory behaviour towards others based on ANY personal characteristics will not be tolerated!

    Accounts that mislead or misrepresent the true identity of a user will be banned immediately (no fake celebrities allowed!)

    Harassment, bullying or otherwise inciting hatred against others is prohibited

    Users are responsible for vetting articles/links they post or share. Users who repeatedly post "fake news" without stating it is as such will be suspended or banned.

    Content Warnings

    The Mastodon platform offers a "content warning" feature that obscures post content until a user explicitly opens it. This allows for sensitive information or potentially offensive or distressing content to be hidden from those who do not wish to see it. The following should be placed within content warnings:

    Any level of violence, nudity or sexual content that would be deemed higher than a "PG" rating

    Anything that would be considered a "spoiler" when discussing popular movies, television shows, sporting events or current events

    VERY sensitive topics which may incite excessively heated arcuments. Keep in mind that healthy lively discussion is encouraged and users are NOT expected to conceal everything that might be the slightest bit disagreeable!

    Blocked Instances

    Insances that are the source of repeated posts to the federated timeline that violate ou code of conduct will be blacklisted.

    Currently no instances are banned. This area will be kept up to date if and when an instance is added to the blacklist.

    Email: info@coalesco.ca

    Admin: @msh@coales.co

    mastod.life

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastod Life

    Users: 62 . Toots: 135 . Connections: 472 . Language: English

    A friendly mastodon instance for anyone to sign up to.

    • Fast
    • Secure
    • Stable
    • Reliable
    • Friendly
    • Awesome

    This instance does take a lot of hard work to run, and renting servers is not free. If it is at all possible a small donation towards the running costs would be grateful. You can follow this link for a few different methods of donating.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastod.life; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: paul.meeke@acclaro.digital

    Admin: @pmeeke@mastod.life

    mst3k.interlinked.me

    about

    preview

    join

    Interlinked MST3K

    Users: 98 . Toots: 46865 . Connections: 865 . Language: English

    This is a Mastodon instance run by the interlinked.me collective. See this for a primer on Mastodon.

    More Info... We are a general-purpose community and anyone is welcome, as long as they follow the rules.

    The rules boil down to this: DON'T BE A DICK. The below serves as a more specific Code of Conduct.

    Code of conduct

    This is not a legal document.

    Nothing in this document is or should be construed as legal advice. We're not lawyers.

    Information

    These are our rules. Failure to adhere to this will result in warnings, silencing, or blocking.

    This site is moderated. This is not a free speech zone. There are other instances devoted to this if you disagree with our policies.

    Interpretation is entirely up to us.

    Remote users and instances are held to these standards and will be dealt with accordingly.

    Community guidelines should be construed as a base for these rules and interpreted with that frame of reference.

    We reserve the right to silence or ban anyone for any reason not in the rules, or to proactively do so.

    These rules apply not only to posts, but also to boosts, favourites, bios, or anything else that involves interaction with the site

    Banned forms of conduct

    These forms of conduct are not permitted and will result in the aforementioned sanctions:

    Excessive advertising, spam, or ham

    Irritating bots

    Stalking; harassing; threatening; or advocating any physical, sexual, or emotional harm against individuals or groups

    Promotion of extremely authoritarian forms of rule, including fascism and Stalinism

    Denial of documented genocides, pogroms, or purges

    Content that is prohibited in Germany, France, the European Union, or the United States of America

    Any sexual content featuring anyone under 18, including artistic depictions

    Patterns of extreme trolling

    Engaging in bad faith debate, or refusing to end debate if the other party wishes to

    Encouraging others to disregard this or other codes of conduct at other instances, or refusal to abide by the code of conduct of other instances (at our discretion)

    Attempts to prevent others from using this service, or degrading the quality or performance of it

    Unauthorised distribution of any personal information or data

    Circumventing any sanction, or sockpuppeting or meatpuppeting to circumvent a sanction

    Using sockpuppeting, meatpuppeting, or organising others to break the rules en masse

    Bots that do not respect the #nobot profile tag (following a user with such a tag in their profile)

    Abuse or misuse of the code of conduct, pursuing or grandstanding after an issue has been resolved to our satisfaction, pettifogging, or rule lawyering

    Registering accounts with inherently malicious intent

    Conduct filtered from the public timeline

    The following forms of conduct will be removed from the public timeline if seen:

    Astroturfing

    Bots that engage in promotion of news sources without permission

    Untagged gore, pornography, or other explicit content (use the NSFW tag)

    Patterns of excessive rudeness

    Links to pirated content, or instructions on how to commit piracy

    Propaganda, except for demonstration purposes

    Jingoism

    Political extremism not otherwise prohibited

    Advocating or promoting illegal acts

    Silenced, suspended, and media blocked instances

    We do not federate everywhere.

    We silence, suspend, and media block certain instances. For a list of such instances, brief summary of rationales, and what to do if you're on the list, see here.

    Other information

    Our AmbassadorBot can be found here.

    If you are an Interlinked user, you may be interested in this information on who's who.

    You can visit us at the Interlinked IRC network if you want to talk to us.

    Administration

    The patients in charge of this asylum are:

    Elizafox

    Mismagius

    luciferMysticus

    amrofnoc

    Alms to the poor

    If you like the service, consider donating to our Patreon.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @Elizafox@mst3k.interlinked.me

    Kirakiratter

    Users: 3054 . Toots: 542448 . Connections: 1195 . Language: English

    ここはMastodonですが「トゥート！」が「カツ!」に、また象ではなくうさぎがいます。 このサーバーに参加するのにアイカツ！のファンである必要はありませんが、kirakiratterにいるほとんどのユーザーはアイカツ！ファンです。

    詳しくは こちら 。また、 wiki があります。


    It's Mastodon but "toot" is "katsu" and also there's a rabbit. You don't have to be an Aikatsu fan, but the majority of users on here are.

    See the extended info page for more details.

    More Info...

    The site icon is by @southrop (CC-BY 4.0).

    The Aikatsu-themed onboarding text is by @sumire and @bitmap.

    The Kirakiratter theme, kktCSS, is by @MasterDalK and contributors, and is available on GitHub.

    キラキラッターのルール

    公開範囲の制限やCW・NSFWを活用して、ローカルタイムラインは親子で楽しめる場所にしましょう

    他人の作品を勝手に投稿してはいけません（アニメのキャプチャや公式のイラストを除きます）

    Guidelines

    Keep the local timeline family-friendly, and use the CW/NSFW flags accordingly

    Do not post someone else's artwork without permission (anime screenshots and official art are ok)

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @walfie@kirakiratter.com

    mastodon.diglateam3.com

    about

    preview

    でぃぐら丼。

    Users: 2 . Toots: 52 . Connections: 15 . Language: 日本語

    mastodon.diglateam3.com

    「でぃぐら丼。」について

    「でぃぐら丼。」は個人サークル「Diglateam's Laboratory」が管理する、Mastodonインスタンスです。

    新規登録について

    主に自分用に立ち上げたインスタンスなので、新規登録は受け付けていません。ごめんなさい！

    ただし、「僕と実際にお会いしたことがある」かつ、「何らかの創作・同人活動をしている」方であれば、例外的に受け付ける可能性があります。

    詳しくは、Twitterへご連絡ください。

    利用規約

    日本の法律もしくは（サーバー設置先の）ConoHaの規約上で、問題のある発言や内容でなければ、基本的に許可します。

    ただし、スパム行為や上記に反する内容、主義主張を過度に押し付け、他人の言動や行動を制限する、あるいは試みる行為が確認できた場合、内容によっては当インスタンス内アカウントのサスペンドや、最悪の場合インスタンスのブロックを行いますので、ご了承ください。ノー押し付け、レッツ交渉話し合い。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @diglateam3@mastodon.diglateam3.com

    taruntarun.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - taruntarun.net

    Users: 16 . Toots: 1868 . Connections: 587 . Language: 日本語

    たるんたるん！
    安定稼働を目指しますが、不定期の再起動を行う場合があります。

    注意

    • パスワードの使い回しは絶対にしないでください。
      一通りのセキュリティ対策は施していますが安全に絶対はありません。
    • スマホ・ケータイメールアドレスを登録に用いる場合、
      mastodon-notice_at_taruntarun.net ( _at_ を＠に置換 )
      からのメールを受信できるようにしてから登録を行ってください。
    • エロ・グロなどの理由で 18 禁になりそうな文章には Content Warning 、同画像には NSFW タグを付けてください。
      守られていない場合、アカウント削除などの対処をする場合があります。
    • 1 秒間に何回もフォロー・ふぁぼ・ブースト等を行うような、サーバーに過度の負荷をかける行為はお避けください。
    • 情報収集などを行うような自動処理による利用は原則禁止です。
      見つけ次第アカウント削除などの対処をする場合があります。

    禁止行為

    • 公序良俗に反する行為
    • 日本国内の法律に違反する行為
    • 犯罪をほのめかす行為
    • 出会い系などの宣伝行為
    • 他者を中傷・損害を与える行為
    • 実在の人物・団体など他者になりすます行為
    • 他者の著作物を無断転載する行為
    • サーバーに過度の負荷をかける行為

    何かあれば Mastodon: @mayaeh または Twitter: @mayaeh までご連絡ください。

    登録に使用したメールアドレス・パスワード (機密情報という) は特段の事情がない限り管理者も閲覧することはいたしません。

    また機密情報は警察等からの要請がない限り他人に渡すことはいたしません。

    また機密情報は当サイト運営のためだけに使用し、他の用途に転用することはいたしません。

    ただし利用者に連絡を取る必要があり、他の連絡手段がない場合に限り該当者のメールアドレスを閲覧し、連絡を試みる場合があります。

    Email: mail@taruntarun.net

    Admin: @mayaeh@taruntarun.net

    ika.queloud.net - SplatoonのMastodon

    Users: 690 . Toots: 40464 . Connections: 278 . Language: 日本語

    任天堂のゲーム「Splatoon」を愛するイカ達が集まるMastodonです。

    初心者から上級者まで、Splatoonが好きなイカ達がまったりと会話に興じています。
    あなたもイカの世界の住民になってみませんか？

    イカ、よろしく〜

    More Info...

    お約束

    公序良俗、国内法に反する投稿、犯罪に加担するような投稿はおやめ下さい。

    Mastodonのサービスの特性上、他サービスで使っているアカウント情報を使いまわすことは極力お控え下さい

    このインスタンスは個人が運用しています。鯖の永続性は保証できない点にご容赦下さい

    楽しんで行って下さい！

    イカトドンをもっと楽しむために

    イカトドン用Stylish

    URL: https://userstyles.org/styles/141847/ikadon

    作者: うどんさん ( @hiyaudon )

    イカトドン用Discord

    その1: https://discord.gg/ekMfqpq

    その2: https://discord.gg/hpfVdGK

    作者: 島ねこよしかさん ( @shimaneko )

    ルールなど

    イカトドン用イベントカレンダー

    URL: イベントカレンダー

    作者: ひょうさん ( @liniism )

    イカトドン用イベント要望フォーム

    URL: イベント要望フォーム

    作者: ひょうさん ( @liniism )

    寄付のお願い

    寄付先一覧

    Enty

    このインスタンスは、管理人（ @admin ）の私費により運用されています。

    寄付を頂くことで、より永くインスタンスを運用することが可能になるため、ご検討頂ければ幸いです。

    寄付を頂いた方には、このページへのお名前掲載や、その他ページへの導線、レポートの閲覧、当インスタンスとの機能連携等を考えています。

    支援者一覧（敬称略・先着順）

    りっ（くん） ( Mastodon: @li )

    ぎんいろ ( Mastodon: @gyin_silvercat )

    NAO ( Mastodon: @NAO_shooter )

    関連リンク

    ゆかり王国民向けインスタンス「yukarin.club」

    gami ( Mastodon: @gami )

    ぼたもち ( Mastodon: @bota_mochi )

    おてら（おもっちん） ( Mastodon: @otera05 )

    匿名で支援して下さった方々

    感謝感激です！！！！

    イカ、よろしく〜〜〜

    dartsdon.jp

    dartsdon

    Users: 12 . Toots: 58 . Connections: 120 . Language: English

    ソフト・ハードを問わず、ダーツに関する話題なら何でもどうぞ。
    アカウント登録用の連絡メールが、迷惑メールになってしまう事があります。
    dartsdon.jpからのメールを受信できるようにしておいてください。
    なお、このサーバーは実験的な位置づけです。
    急なサービス停止などがありますので、ご注意ください。

    ６月１日にアップデートに失敗して、サイト情報を全部飛ばしてしまいました...

    バックアップも消失してしまい、アカウントも過去のトゥートも全て消えてしまっています。

    preview

    join

    Balloo!TV実況(TBS)

    Users: 3 . Toots: 4440 . Connections: 3 . Language: English

    テレビ実況用マストドンです！
    こちらは、TBS放送に関する実況専用となります。

    ご利用にあたって

    • 特定の個人、団体等を中傷、非難する発言や道徳的に問題のある発言などの投稿は固く禁じます。
    • 暴力的なもの、裸が写っているものなど、他人を不快にする内容のコンテンツと判断される可能性がある画像/動画のアップロードを固く禁じます
    • 著作権を侵害する恐れのある画像/動画の投稿もご遠慮ください。

    テレビの実況専用のマストドンです。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    現在、鯖管自身は稼働控えめにして様子見ですが
    利用者様は、法に触れない範囲でご自由にしていただければと思ってます。

    babuu.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Babuu（バブー）

    Users: 349 . Toots: 15061 . Connections: 252 . Language: English

    【Babuuについて】

    Babuuは育児・子育てに関わる方々を対象としたMastodonのインスタンスです。

    父母はもちろん、祖父祖母おじおば、教育、医療、福祉関係者etc…育児に関わる方ならだれでもOK!

    育児の合間の一息に、ママさんパパさん達のコミュニケーションに、ぜひご利用ください。

    More Info... ■最低限の利用ルール

    たとえそれがかわいい赤ちゃんでも、局部の写り込んだ写真の投稿はNGです。

    R18の投稿はお控えください。判断が難しい場合は積極的にCWやNSFWを投稿時にに活用しましょう。

    その他公序良俗に反する投稿は禁止します。

    ■お知らせについて

    Babuu内部向けアナウンスは以下のアカウントから行います。

    Babuu(@Babuuclub)

    ■管理者とお問い合わせ先

    管理者は@itacchiku(2児の母)です。

    問い合わせは、

    Babuu(@itacchiku)

    Twitter(@itacchiku)

    までご連絡ください。

    ■ちょっとしたQ&A;

    ・登録メールが届かない

    登録時の返送メールがとどかない場合、迷惑メールフォルダに振り分けられていることがよくあるようです。ご確認ください。

    ・ログインしてみたら画面が真っ黒

    マストドンは現在IE非対応となっています。IE以外のブラウザでログインするか、スマホアプリをご利用ください。

    ・外部インスタンスとの接続について

    一部のR18系をメインとしたインスタンスとの接続を除き、自由に開放しています。R18または差別的なトゥートの多いインスタンス及びアカウントがあれば、管理人までお知らせください。

    Email: babuu.club@gmail.com

    Admin: @Babuuclub@babuu.club

    tusk.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Tusk.Social

    Users: 579 . Toots: 8953 . Connections: 738 . Language: English

    PLEASE NOTE: There is no way yet to delete accounts or change usernames. So please bear that in mind before creating an account.

    Just another Mastodon instance. But we like it here. Bad behavior is not rewarded. If your hobbies involve harassing people, the constant use of 'SJW' or 'cuck' as pejoratives, or just general shitposting, then find somewhere else to go. You own your freedom. I own the server. A longer, more-detailed policy for this instance is in the works.

    Tusk.social uses the Witches.Town domain block list .

    Don't harass. Don't be a shitty person. Do that, and we'll get along just fine.

    PS - Yo, please get an icon straight away so you don't look like a bot. Also, local accounts which haven't tooted after 45 days are subject to deletion/suspension. Also also, while it's not a rule, just a request... please don't use this instance for follow bots and the like. If it takes, rather than contributes, please do that somewhere else.

    Extended About Page

    FYI - hotmail.com, outlook.com and live.com (so... all of Microsoft, basically) don't like our mail host (mailgun). So... you might have problems if your email is with one of those. Sorry.

    "What's this Mastodon thing all about??" - Here are a couple of articles to get you started.

    http://www.theverge.com/2017/4/7/15183128/mastodon-open-source-twitter-clone-how-to-use https://medium.com/@qinaliu/what-i-wish-i-knew-before-joining-mastodon-7a17e7f12a2b

    Email: accounts@tusk.social

    Admin: @tankgrrl@tusk.social

    masto.themimitoof.fr

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - by themimitoof.fr

    Users: 1634 . Toots: 18281 . Connections: 858 . Language: English

    Masto.themimitoof.fr is an instance by themimitoof.fr . Join us on this great community!
    Masto.themimitoof.fr est une instance par themimitoof.fr . Rejoignez-nous sur cette belle communauté !

    More Info...

    /* Yes I know.. It's so bad here but it's needed :/ */

    ul.li li { margin-bottom: 2px; }

    h3 { margin-top: 8px; }

    (French) Bienvenue sur Mastodon !

    🌎 Click here if you likely to scroll to the English version

    Bienvenue sur cette instance gérée par themimitoof. Cette instance a pour but de contribuer à la création du réseau Mastodon.

    Quelques règles pour bien vivre

    Toutes les langues sont autorisées sur cette instance

    Evitez le flood/spam

    Merci d'utiliser la fonction NSFW lorsqu'il s'agit d'un contenu partiellement autorisé

    Il est strictement interdit de parler/poster du contenu :

    à caractère sexuel (ce qui est en revanche autorisée : l'art (par exemple : une femme ou un homme dénudé·e peint·e, une statue), pas d'organe génital apparent (privilégiez tout de même l'utilisation de la fonction NFSW).)

    insulter, discriminer, violence verbale, menacer, chantage, harceler et tout ce qui a un lien avec la cyberviolence

    parler de sujets sensibles (réligieux, terrorisme, etc...)

    Comptes parodiques autorisés. Veuillez juste le signaler.

    Aucun compte ne sera clos sans une bonne raison

    Nous sommes bénévoles, merci de respecter notre engagement

    Amusez-vous et faites-vous de nouveaux amis 🙂

    Rétention des données

    La loi demande à ce que les données de connexion soient conservées 1 an. Parmi, ces informations, nous stockons :

    Votre adresse IP

    Votre nom d'utilisateur

    Les appels serveurs

    La date de la requête

    Ses données permettront en cas de problème, de retrouver toute piste en cas de litige.

    Droit à l'oubli

    Pour le moment, il est impossible de supprimer un compte d'une instance mais il est en revanche possible de suspendre son compte.

    En attendant que cette fonctionnalité soit disponible, nous proposons aux utilisateurs de faire une demande de suspension de compte avec l'ajout de votre adresse e-mail dans notre liste d'utilisateurs à supprimer. La suspension du compte aura pour effet de dé-indexer le compte et les toots de l'utilisateur concerné. Ainsi, nous ferons le nécessaire (avec confirmation du propriétaire du compte), de supprimer le compte de l'utilisation ainsi que ses toots et médias lorsque que cette fonctionnalité sera disponible.

    Support

    En cas de nécessité, vous pourriez avoir besoin d'aide. Le serveur ainsi que l'instance est entièrement géré par @themimitoof (disponible sur Twitter). En cas de problème avec votre compte ou d'un problème technique, vous pouvez envoyez un e-mail à contact+mastodon[at]mvieira[dot]fr.

    Liste des administrateurs :

    @themimitoof

    Contribution fiancière

    L'infrastructure coute à ce jour 40€. Après plusieurs demandes, nous vous proposons plusieurs moyens pour nous aider à financer l'infrastructure :

    Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/themimitoof

    Bitcoin: 1F2igjKPA5eDPAmUmAvUrW5qqXZHkU686

    Ethereum: 0x259C9B4A0f477bb6a9ff49779e5A4adAF45B4627

    (English) Welcome on Mastodon!

    🌎 Cliquez ici pour voir la version française. This part is is back soon!

    Email: contact+mastodon@mvieira.fr

    Admin: @themimitoof@masto.themimitoof.fr

    mastodon.co.nz

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.co.nz - Mastodon New Zealand

    Users: 51 . Toots: 56 . Connections: 136 . Language: English

    "Mastodon is a free, open-source social network. A decentralized alternative to commercial platforms, it avoids the risks of a single company monopolizing your communication. Pick a server that you trust — whichever you choose, you can interact with everyone else. Anyone can run their own Mastodon instance and participate in the social network seamlessly."

    Mastodon New Zealand

    Email: info@mastodon.co.nz

    Admin: @ToroNZ@mastodon.co.nz

    mastodon.cyber-tribal.com

    about

    preview

    Cyber-Elasmotherium

    Users: 2 . Toots: 19 . Connections: 499 . Language: Français

    Cette instance Mastodon est a usage privé.

    More Info... Les lignes directrices suivantes ne sont pas un document légal, et l'interprétation finale incombe à l'administration de Cyber-Tribal.com; Elles sont là pour vous donner un aperçu de nos politiques de modération de contenu:

    Les types de contenu suivants seront supprimés du fil public:

    Publicité excessive

    Des bots d'information inexploités publiés à partir de sources de nouvelles tierces

    La pornographie non marquée et le contenu sexuellement explicite

    Horreur non marquée et violence extrêmement graphique

    Les types de contenu suivants seront supprimés du fil public et peuvent entraîner la suspension du compte et la révocation de l'accès au service:

    Racisme ou évocation du racisme

    Sexisme ou évocation du sexisme

    Discrimination à l'égard du genre et des minorités sexuelles, ou évocation de ceux-ci

    Xenophobie et/ou nationalisme extrême

    Les types de contenu suivants sont explicitement refusés et entraîneront une révocation de l'accès au service:

    Les représentations sexuelles des enfants

    Contenu illégal en Allemagne et/ou en France, comme le déni de l'holocauste ou le symbolisme nazi

    Promotion de l'idéologie du national-socialisme

    Toute conduite visant à harceler d'autres utilisateurs, ou à empêcher les autres utilisateurs d'utiliser le service, de dégrader les performances du service ou d'inciter d'autres utilisateurs à effectuer l'une des actions susmentionnées est également interdit et assujetti à la sanction pouvant aller jusqu'à la révocation de l'accès au service. Cela inclut, mais sans s'y limiter, les comportements suivants:

    Continuer à engager une conversation avec un utilisateur qui a spécifiquement demandé à arréter peut être considéré comme un harcèlement, indépendamment des outils de confidentialité spécifiques à la plate-forme utilisés.

    L'agrégation, l'affichage et/ou la diffusion des données démographiques, personnelles ou privées d'une personne sans autorisation expresse peuvent être considérés comme un harcèlement.

    Inciter les utilisateurs à engager un autre utilisateur dans une interaction ou une discussion continue après qu'un utilisateur a demandé que ledit engagement avec cet utilisateur cesse peut être considéré comme un harcèlement.

    Malgré ces dispositions, l'administration du service se réserve le droit de révoquer les autorisations d'accès d'un utilisateur, à tout moment, pour quelque raison que ce soit, sauf dans les limites prévues par la loi.

    Email: jph.bocquenet@gmail.com

    Admin: @bocquenet@mastodon.cyber-tribal.com

    mstdn.intmax.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    More Info... Bienvenu sur l'instance mastodon du domaine crypt.lol.

    Les inscriptions sont actuellement ouvertes, n'hésitez pas à nous rejoindre.

    < Règles >

    Nous n'imposons aucune règle particulière en matière d'expression et demandons simplement de faire preuve de bon sens. Comprendre: si nous recevons des plaintes pour des motifs légitimes, votre compte saute.

    Toute forme de menace, harcèlement, chantage, ..., envers un autre utilisateur.trice du fediverse est donc proscrite.

    Pour le reste, vos publications sont de votre responsabilité.

    < Infos >

    Le serveur est hébergé en France sur le réseau d'Iliad. Nous accordons de l'importance au respect de la vie privée et les disques durs sont donc chiffrés. Plus d'infos ici.

    < Admin >

    Administrateurs.trices d'une instance ? En cas de problème, vous pouvez contacter le compte @Pachy ou utiliser l'addresse mail présente sur cette page.

    Vous pouvez également contacter @Neph ou @Diagamma si vous n'obtenez pas de réponses suffisamment rapidement.

    Kinky Business

    Users: 260 . Toots: 6030 . Connections: 576 . Language: English

    kinky.business is a Mastodon instance for the kink community. All you naughty people are in the right place. Sign up and let's go :)

    More Info... I'm @bedtimedrillsgt, a 30-something Dom. Beard and boobs enthusiast.

    I built this Mastodon instance because there's plenty of room for fun sub-communities in the fediverse. And so, here is a home for all you kinky, filthy fucks.

    Discuss your hopes and desires, post your latest toys or bruises and most of all, have fun.

    If you have any questions or concerns, toot at me

    Rules

    Keep everything here safe, sane, and consensual. No exceptions.

    Do not flood the server with posts

    Use NSFW/CW tags for NSFW media

    Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

    Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content

    Feel free to report users or content that should not be here.

    Admins of this site reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    A note on federation

    This is a regularly federated instance. Keep in mind that CW/NSFW tags are necessary not to get blocked by other servers. Be thoughtful of the people who might be reading / seeing your content on their federated timelines.

    Email: admin@kinky.business

    Admin: @bedtimedrillsgt@kinky.business

    moseisley.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Mos Eisley

    Users: 10 . Toots: 32 . Connections: 279 . Language: English

    Welcome to Mos Eisley, a Star Wars themed Mastodon instance! The instance is not restricted to Star Wars related content: general use is welcome and expected.
    Bantha Milk is our sister instance.

    More Info... Want to support our community financially?

    PayPal

    Patreon

    Our sponsor and admin:

    @GadgetVirtuoso

    Thank you for any support you provide!

    Code of Conduct:

    "Star Wars is for everyone" therefore, Mos Eisley is for everyone.

    Spoiler policy:

    Tag all spoiler content related to any movies or TV shows.

    Adult and NSFW policy:

    Tag all adult and NSFW content.

    Suggested Roleplaying Protocols:

    💭 thoughts

    🗯 yelling

    💬 incoming communication, or communication to other character

    [[actions]]

    ❌ speaking as the account owner, not as the character

    What is Mos Eisley?

    Mos Eisley is the infamous space port from A New Hope. See Mos Eisley on Wookiepedia, The Star Wars Wiki.

    Disclaimer:

    Mos Eisely is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Disney, Lucasfilm Limited or any of its subsidiaries, employees, or associates.

    Email: info@moseisley.club

    Admin: @gadgetvirtuoso@moseisley.club

    donsuke.biz

    about

    preview

    join

    ドン助平

    Users: 87 . Toots: 73 . Connections: 32 . Language: English

    エロい事大好きな人の為のインスタンス です。エロトゥート・エロ画像・妄想話・エロ同人・エロ小説・etc...なんでもOKです。全ての画像がNSFW対象になるのが理想です。という訳で基本的にNSFW指定で画像を投稿しましょう。 H な人達の心のオアシス となる事を目指して。

    基本ルール

    • 法令順守でお願いします
    • 他人を誹謗中傷するような発言は控えましょう
    • 出会いの場ではありません。個人情報をトゥートしないように
    • エロは大人のたしなみ。紳士淑女のモラルある行動をお願いします。

    いつでもどこでもエッチな事しか考えられない人の為の性のはけ口インスタンスでありたい。 考えている事をこのインスタンスで吐き出しちゃいましょう。性に対する思いをぶちまける事が出来る唯一無二にインスタンスを目指します。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    meow.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Meow social

    Users: 409 . Toots: 5082 . Connections: 928 . Language: English

    This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

    More Info... Welcome to meow.social! A mastodon instance.

    NetData Monitoring

    Admin members : @Tiwy57 and @Nomaxice

    Official Accounts : @TransparencyReports and @meow

    This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

    Meow is federated to nearly all instances of mastodon, which means you can follow pretty much anyone you want, no matter what instance they are on!

    While it is open publicly, mind this is just one instance in the fediverse, and we encourage you to look at other instances available to be sure it’s the one you like, and if none please you and you got some knowledge, why not come help mastodon by making your own instance too!

    Ruleset

    Stay legal.

    Respect international laws.

    Respect laws from the country the instance is hold in (Netherlands).

    Respect laws from the admins' country (France).

    Respect laws from your own country.

    Be respectful.

    Don’t go insult others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.

    Contents that are racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way are forbidden.

    Stalking and harassment is forbidden, if someone don’t want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.

    Tag your content.

    Tag as NSFW content properly, hidden behind a CW button, and keep porn as private or unlisted for AD posts.

    Tag gore and NSFL content and keep it behind a CW button.

    Tag politics and the like, again with a CW button.

    Accounts policy.

    Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (so long as you stay respectful).

    Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.

    Bots must be tagged as such, and bot owners must ensure they will have a minimal impact on the instance's performances.

    If your handle has been taken or stolen, and have the means to prove it yours, we will reattribute it to you.

    Do NOT use a "verified" status (with checkmark) : prove that you are someone official by all your means possible

    You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account has been suspended.

    Failure to respect any of those rules will lead to a warning, content removal, and/or suspension of your account.

    The admins have the upmost right to decide to delete your account for any reason.

    You may discuss with the admins if you feel you were unfairly sanctioned, so long as you don’t try to force your way after the final statement has been given by them.

    If you require any help or need to contact us, please contact @Tiwy57, @Nomaxice, or send a mail at meow@meow.social

    About this server

    This server is hosted on Scaleway, with four dedicated CPU cores, 8GB RAM, and 50GB of storage on SSD. It can be updated any time. Uptime will be kept at the highest possible, hopefully only going down for updates.

    Email: meow@meow.social

    Admin: @Tiwy57@meow.social
